name: Time Management
description: Master the art of prioritizing tasks and maximizing productivity.

levels.title: Prioritization Basics
levels.objective: Learn to distinguish between urgent and important tasks.
levels.description: Understand the Eisenhower Matrix and how to categorize your daily to-do list.
practices: Use the Eisenhower Matrix for one week
Create a daily to-do list the night before

levels.title: Deep Work & Focus
levels.objective: Develop the ability to focus without distraction.
levels.description: Learn techniques like Pomodoro and time blocking to achieve deep work states.
practices: Practice 2 hours of deep work daily
Turn off notifications during work blocks
Use time blocking for your weekly schedule

levels.title: Goal Setting & Review
levels.objective: Align daily actions with long-term goals.
levels.description: Implement a system for weekly and monthly reviews to ensure you are on track.
practices: Conduct a weekly review every Friday
Set SMART goals for the next quarter
Analyze where your time actually went vs. planned
